title: U.K.'s Johnson Warns Lockdown to Last Until at Least March 8
content:
1. U.K.'s Johnson Warns Lockdown to Last Until at Least March 8  Bloomberg
  2. Boris Johnson 'Deeply Sorry' As U.K. Covid Toll Passes 100000 | NBC News NOW  NBC News
  3. UK's Johnson hopes schools in England can reopen on March 8  The Associated Press
  4. Here are five ways the government could have avoided 100,000 Covid deaths  The Guardian
  5. Covid-19: PM to give update as schools closed until March  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 英国约翰逊警告封锁至少持续到3月8日。
英國約翰遜警告封鎖至少持續到3月8日。
